content: **knitted mittens in drops snow the piece is worked in stocking stitch from cuff to finger tip ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #violetveilmittens drops design pattern ee-785 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl circumference 17-19-21 cm length 25-26-27 cm **yarn** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 100-100-100 g colour 10 mulberry purple drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 12 stitches in width and 15 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 7 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
